timeline.message: spliting SentimenLabel to DocumentSentimentLabel and SentenceSentimentLabel

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why we change the property/attribute name from sentiment to sentimentLabel?
timeline.author: maririos

replies.bodyText: Not a strong reason why should change to sentimentLabel. Will change back to sentiment.
replies.author: mssfang

timeline.author: maririos

timeline.bodyText:
NIT: not sure we want to specify that mixed is not an option. It could trigger the question, but why not?
instead of just not mentioning it
timeline.author: maririos

timeline.message: change back to getSentiment but not getSentimentLabel
